Description: Shifting from the B2B Sales & Marketing Exchange to #B2BMX East, our East Co ast version of the B2B Marketing Exchange invites attendees to explore innovative strategies and bold ideas that will shape sales and marketing in 2025 and beyond.
Agenda: Registration, Workshops, From Strategy To Execution: Building A Successful B2B Go-to-Market (GTM) Plan, Lunch, Marketplace Open, CMO Exchange, Case Studies + Labs, Networking Break, Campfire Keynote: Supercharge Your Lead Generation With AI, Opening Reception
